solution_line_template: One dozen of flowers is equal to {dozen_quantity} x {flowers_per_dozen} = <<{dozen_quantity}*{flowers_per_dozen}={total_flowers}>>{total_flowers} flowers.
There are {total_flowers} - {daisies} = <<{total_flowers}-{daisies}={non_daisy_flowers}>>{non_daisy_flowers} flowers that are not daisies.
So, {non_daisy_flowers} x {tulip_fraction_numerator}/{tulip_fraction_denominator} = {tulips} of the flowers are tulips.
